__e: Never mind if it's a fire hazard.
But he is a fire hazard.
Well, I knew you weren't in any real danger --
Well, that's a danger of doing things a day early, I guess.
You knew she was in danger? You knew and you did nothing?
That's when I thought that you were in danger, and you're not, so I want you to go right now!
Well, he saw she was in trouble and he didn't do anything.
But she is in danger, and you yourself can't go ...
It's just hard knowing that the people I love are in danger and I'm not there.
There is a girl out there who really needs my help, who really is in trouble, and I have nothing for her.
It means he's a threat to the city. We have to find him.
But no danger to his life.
Your friend is a danger to himself and to others.
"A danger to yourself or others," so which one are you?
If I think that she's a danger to herself, or to you...
You know, this kid is more of a danger to himself than anybody else.
But he now poses a danger to you and your family.
If he doesn't know who he is, then he's a danger to all of us.
I suppose that's why I'm such a danger to myself.
I mean, look, I'm not gonna endanger anyone or anything else.
Tonight I have endangered the life of my son.
Why do you want to endanger my life?
But he doesn't mean you any harm.
Well, if I am, then I'm already a danger to you.
Do you have any idea how dangerous it is for you to be here?
No matter how scared she was to tell you, no matter how dangerous it is to be with him, all that matters is, they're together.
A hazard that tells me that, uh, one thing's for sure...
Me being in danger is one thing, ok?
But with your son in danger, is that really what you want to do ?
If anyone's in danger, it's him.
